protocol.name: P-GSE44405-1
protocol.text: Quality control was performed using Expression Console, differential gene expression was detected using Partek Genomics Suite and RMA was used for normalization ID_REF =  VALUE = RMA signal

protocol.name: P-GSE44405-2
protocol.text: Pistils were dissected from surrounding floral tissues and immerdiately frozen on dry ice

protocol.name: P-GSE44405-3
protocol.text: ms1 pistils (100 per collection) were either collected at stage 14 without pollination, or pollinated at 9am with respective genotypes and allowed to grow for 8 hours

protocol.name: P-GSE44405-4
protocol.text: Total RNA was extracted using the RNeasy kit (Qiagen), The yield and RNA purity were determined by Nano-Drop (Thermo Scientific), and RNA integrity was checked using an Agilent 2100 Bioanalyzer (Agilent Technologies)

protocol.name: P-GSE44405-5
protocol.text: 100 ng total RNA was amplified using Affymetrix 3' IVT express kit according to manufacturers instructions.

protocol.name: P-GSE44405-6
protocol.text: 10 ug fragmented IVT cRNA was hybridized overnight at 45 Cat 60 rpm to Arabidopsis ATH1 arrays

protocol.name: P-GSE44405-7
protocol.text: Arrays were scanned using Affymetrix 3000 G7 scanner
